name: FunnyJunk Red
additional_info:
Red everywhere... If you're having issues that this style adds red to other pages:
1. Copy code onto your clipboard
2. Go to www.funnyjunk.com
3. With the stylish icon, click it and edit the 'FunnyJunk Red'
4. Paste the code in, and the bottom select 'URLs on the domain'
5. Place 'www.funnyjunk.com' and press add. There should be no problems.

(I don't know how to do it myself in the code lol)

This is my first ever CSS creation, and first version (v.1).
I don't see anything too major that needs to be fixed. If anyone actually even sees this, contact me on FJ by the user name 'agx' if you have suggestion/feedback/troubles.
